columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The timestamp (UTC) reflecting the time in which the event was generated.

columns.name: IngestionTime
columns.description: The date and time that the line was written to the store. This is used when there are multiple lines for each file, such as when a change is detected, or if 24 hours have passed since the last store line was added.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: Time the asset information was collected (snapshot or the changefeed of that asset was taken)

columns.name: AssetID
columns.description: Unique identifier of the Asset. E.g. device ID, Document ID etc.

columns.name: CreatedDateTime
columns.description: Date and time the Asset was created.

columns.name: AssetOwner
columns.description: Owner of the asset: e.g. File owner (from filesystem metadata). AccountUpn

columns.name: AssetName
columns.description: Name of the Asset

columns.name: AssetType
columns.description: Type of the asset: File, Site, Mailbox etc.

columns.name: AssetPermissions
columns.description: Permission strings on the assets

columns.name: AdditionalFields
columns.description: Additional unmapped information about the event in JSON array format

columns.name: Provider
columns.description: The vendor who is providing this information: Microsoft/3P Providers etc.

columns.name: AssetSource
columns.description: The source which generates the information: Microsoft, Snowflake, Salesforce etc.

columns.name: AADTenantID
columns.description: Customer AAD Tenant ID

columns.name: Workload
columns.description: The workload within the source which is generating this information: Azure, M365 etc.

columns.name: SubWorkload
columns.description: Sub workload within the Workload which is generating this information: Exchange, SharePoint, Teams in M365

columns.name: Location
columns.description: Location of the resolved IP (city/region/country), source from which it came from.

columns.name: Region
columns.description: Geographical information

columns.name: Classification
columns.description: Sensitive Data classification: PII, HIPAA, Financial Data, etc. MIP classification and confidence level

columns.name: ClassificationLastScanDateTime
columns.description: Last time an asset was scanned to derive the classification. This is necessary to understand the darkdata on the Purview side.

columns.name: IsProtectedByDlp
columns.description: Whether the asset is protected by any DLP policy

columns.name: Risks
columns.description: All the documented issues or risks attached to the asset.

columns.name: IdentityDirectorySource
columns.description: e.g Azure Active Directory, Okta etc.

columns.name: LastAccessDateTime
columns.description: Last date and time the asset was accessed.

columns.name: LastModifiedDateTime
columns.description: Last date and time the asset was modified.

columns.name: IsAssetRemoved
columns.description: Signifies if the asset is deleted or not?

columns.name: FeedType
columns.description: Signifies "Changefeed" or "Snapshot"

columns.name: SensitivityLabel
columns.description: Whether the file is digitally signed, and if so, whether the signature is valid.

columns.name: ThreatDetected
columns.description: True/False if flagged as malicious.

columns.name: ThreatCategory
columns.description: Type of threat: phishing, malware hosting, etc).

columns.name: ThreatName
columns.description: Name of detected threat family (e.g. malware name).

columns.name: RelatedIndicators
columns.description: Related IOCs (file hashes, IPs, domains).

columns.name: RequestSourceIP
columns.description: (If network-delivered) Source IP associated with the file event.

columns.name: RequestDestinationIP
columns.description: (If network-related) Destination IP.

columns.name: AssetPath
columns.description: Fully qualified path of the asset: Filepath or site path.

columns.name: InternalUserWithPermissionCount
columns.description: Total number of permissions assigned to internal users within an organization. De-duped count of users (preferred)

columns.name: ExternalUserWithPermissionCount
columns.description: Total number of permissions assigned to external users outside an organization. De-duped count of users (preferred)

columns.name: DeviceName
columns.description: Fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of the device or the host name of the file.

columns.name: UserName
columns.description: Account associated with the file action.

columns.name: AssetSize
columns.description: Size of the file in bytes.

columns.name: MD5
columns.description: MD5 hash of the file.

columns.name: SHA1
columns.description: SHA1 hash of the file.

columns.name: SHA256
columns.description: SHA-256 of the file, if this field is usually not populated â€” use the SHA1 column when available.

columns.name: Extension
columns.description: File extension (e.g., .exe, .docx)

columns.name: SignatureStatus
columns.description: The "signature status" of a file indicates whether its digital signature is valid, invalid, or has a recoverable error, confirming the file's integrity and the sender's identity after being signed with a digital certificate

columns.name: DomainName
columns.description: Fully qualified domain (e.g., malicious-site.com)

columns.name: Subdomain
columns.description: Subdomain accessed (e.g., login.malicious-site.com)

columns.name: TopLevelDomain
columns.description: Extracted TLD (e.g., .com, .org)

columns.name: IPAddress
columns.description: IP address resolved for the domain (IPv4/IPv6).

columns.name: URL
columns.description: Full URL requested (path, query string included).

columns.name: ISP
columns.description: Internet Service Provider hosting the site.

columns.name: ASN
columns.description: Autonomous System Number of the hosting provider.
